step1.heading: Chapter 1 - The Author
step1.intro: Welcome, storyteller! Before we dive into your magical adventure, let's make sure we have your correct information. This helps us personalize your experience and keep you updated on your story's progress.

fields.fullNameHelp: This is how you'll be credited as the author
fields.emailHelp: We'll use this for important updates about your story
fields.mobileHelp: For urgent notifications or delivery updates (optional)

messages.required: Please fill in all required fields
messages.saveFailed: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
messages.loadFailed: Failed to load user information. Please try again.

step2.heading: Chapter 2 - The Story
step2.intro: You can create your story by drawing it, recording it, or simply writing it down.
step2.storyLanguageHelp: Choose the language for your story
step2.textPlaceholder: Once upon a time... Let your imagination run wild! Share your adventure, your dreams, or any story that's close to your heart.
step2.textHelp: Write as much or as little as you'd like. You can always edit this later!
step2.imageHelp: Draw your story, take a photo of it, or upload an existing image that tells your tale.
step2.audioHelp: Record your story directly or upload an audio file. Perfect for those who prefer to speak their tales!
step2.recordingHelp: Tell your story! Speak clearly into your microphone.
step2.reassurance: If you've written text or uploaded an image above, our AI will automatically extract characters, settings, and themes. Otherwise, the next steps will guide you through creating your story step by step.

loadingModal.title: ‚ú® Creating Your Story

step3.heading: Chapter 3 - The Characters
step3.intro: Who are the heroes, friends, and magical creatures in your story? Create characters that will bring your adventure to life!
step3.chooseMethod: Choose how to add a character:
step3.orChooseExisting: Or choose from your existing characters:
step3.readyDescription: Every great story needs amazing characters! Click "Add Character" to create new heroes or add existing characters from your library to this story.
step3.greatWork: Great work! You've created {count, plural, =1 {# character} other {# characters}}.
step3.youCanAlways: You can always add more characters later or continue to the next chapter to develop your story further.

step4.heading: Chapter 4 - The Plot
step4.intro: Now let's define the core elements of your story. Tell us about the world you want to create, who you're writing for, and how you envision your story looking.

fields.title: Book Title *
fields.titleHelp: Choose a captivating title for your story
fields.placeHelp: Where does your story take place? (real or imaginary)
fields.audienceHelp: Who is this story written for?
fields.novelStyleHelp: What genre/style should your story be?
fields.graphicStyleHelp: Choose the artistic style for your story's illustrations
fields.bookSizeHelp: Number of chapters/paragraphs in your story
fields.outlineHelp: Describe your story's plot, characters, and key events
fields.additionalHelp: Any special requests or specific elements you want included

step5.heading: Chapter 5 - The Gift
step5.intro: Choose how you'd like to receive your story. You can select multiple delivery formats to enjoy your story in different ways.
step5.buyMoreCreditsInfo: Credit purchasing functionality is coming soon! Stay tuned for updates.
